Snipsonian SCSS

Object fit

Object-fit mixin, fallbacks for unsuported browsers are not provided.
use-name: snip-object-fit
type: mixin
arguments: $fit
can be set with one of the following: fill, contain, cover, none, scale-down

$x-position
default: center

$y-position
default: center.

Example

HTML

<div class="snip-object-fit-wrapper">
    <div class="original-image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>original image</p>
        <img src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png"> 
    </div>

    <div class="image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>object-fit: fill</p>
        <img class="snip-object-fit-fill" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png">
    </div>

    <div class="image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>object-fit: contain</p>
        <img class="snip-object-fit-contain" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png">
    </div>

    <div class="image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>object-fit: cover</p>
        <img class="snip-object-fit-cover" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png">
    </div>

    <div class="image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>object-fit: none</p>
        <img class="snip-object-fit-none" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png">
    </div>

    <div class="image snip-object-fit-item">
        <p>object-fit: scale-down</p>
        <img class="snip-object-fit-scaledown" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/14179/image.png">
    </div>
</div>

SCSS

.snip-object-fit-fill {
    @include snip-object-fit($fit: fill, $x: center, $y: center);
}

.snip-object-fit-contain {
    @include snip-object-fit($fit: contain, $x: center, $y: center);
}

.snip-object-fit-cover {
    @include snip-object-fit($fit: cover, $x: center, $y: center);
}

.snip-object-fit-none {
    @include snip-object-fit($fit: none, $x: center, $y: center);
}

.snip-object-fit-scale-down {
    @include snip-object-fit($fit: scale-down, $x: center, $y: center);
}

Compiled CSS

@supports (object-fit: fill) {
  .snip-object-fit-fill {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    min-height: auto;
    min-width: auto;
    max-width: none;
    max-height: none;
    object-fit: fill;
  }
}

@supports (object-position: center center) {
  .snip-object-fit-fill {
    object-position: center center;
  }
}

@supports (object-fit: contain) {
  .snip-object-fit-contain {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    min-height: auto;
    min-width: auto;
    max-width: none;
    max-height: none;
    object-fit: contain;
  }
}

@supports (object-position: center center) {
  .snip-object-fit-contain {
    object-position: center center;
  }
}

@supports (object-fit: cover) {
  .snip-object-fit-cover {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    min-height: auto;
    min-width: auto;
    max-width: none;
    max-height: none;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
}

@supports (object-position: center center) {
  .snip-object-fit-cover {
    object-position: center center;
  }
}

@supports (object-fit: none) {
  .snip-object-fit-none {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    min-height: auto;
    min-width: auto;
    max-width: none;
    max-height: none;
    object-fit: none;
  }
}

@supports (object-position: center center) {
  .snip-object-fit-none {
    object-position: center center;
  }
}

@supports (object-fit: scale-down) {
  .snip-object-fit-scale-down {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    min-height: auto;
    min-width: auto;
    max-width: none;
    max-height: none;
    object-fit: scale-down;
  }
}

@supports (object-position: center center) {
  .snip-object-fit-scale-down {
    object-position: center center;
  }
}

Result

original image

object-fit: fill

object-fit: contain

object-fit: cover

object-fit: none

object-fit: scale-down

Pseudo

Mixin to position pseudo elements
use-name: snip-pseudo
type: mixin
arguments: $display
default: block

$position
default: absolute

$content
default: ''

Example

HTML

<div class="snip-pseudo-wrapper snip-pseudo-wrapper-1">
    <p>Absolute position, no content</p>
</div>
<div class="snip-pseudo-wrapper snip-pseudo-wrapper-2">
    <p>Absolute position, content</p>
</div>

SCSS

.snip-pseudo-wrapper-1 {
    &:after {
        @include snip-pseudo($display: block, $pos: absolute);

        top: 0;
        right: 0;
    }
}

.snip-pseudo-wrapper-2 {
    &:after {
        @include snip-pseudo($content: '+1');

        top: 0;
        right: 0;
    }
}

Compiled CSS

.snip-pseudo-wrapper-1:after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
}

.snip-pseudo-wrapper-2:after {
  content: "+1";
  position: absolute;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
}

Result

Absolute position, no content

Absolute position, content
